Message:
I-I can’t believe the Holy Miracle
was a love spell all along...!

So that’s why Master Rosalie
and everyone were all
smirking at me like that...!
Why didn’t anyone tell me~...?!

I already told Boss
I’d show him the Holy Miracle,

and it’s almost
our promised meeting time...!
What do I do~?!

For now, I’ve at least
made my way
to the large tree, but...

Ah, wait...!
Boss is there already...!

When Boss noticed me,
he started waving his hand.

Everybody else
here’s a couple...!
Boss, you idiot...!

If you do that,
it’ll look like we’re
both in...l-l-lo...!

“Oh, B-Boss...! Uh...
D-Did you wait long...?”

When I ran up to him,
Boss replied,
“Not at all”...

I-Isn’t this just like
a d-d-d-d-d—!

Suddenly, Boss pointed
up at the sky.

Oh, it’s snowing...!
It’s so pretty...

Oh yeah...
Didn’t Miss Loki say
something about snowing,
and setting the mood...?
Setting the mood, huh...

Surrounded by embracing
couples on all sides,
the two of us were
enveloped by a sweet,
lovey-dovey atmosphere...
N-Now’s my chance...!
